title: Return of an employee to employment (reactivate an employee file)
content: If you use Nethris or Desjardins and you have already changed the status of your employee, the coordination of information will be done automatically. See article: Coordination of information relating to employee statuses, from Nethris and Desjardins to Emprez.The type of employee affected by this article:A student who returns to work after studies An employee returning from sick and injury leaveAn employee returning from parental leave Any other employee who returns after a work stoppageAccess the Employee's file,Click on Status, (If the date added is in the future, the employee will remain inactive until that date)Add an event as follows,Click on +, on the Details section,Add an earlier date or today's dateIn « Type », choose « Return to Work » ou « Hiring »Save.Helpful?00Updated: 2 years ago Share :
